text: A great place to visit in the winter!
A long hike but very beautiful! Clean picnic area and lots of space. Not usually too crowded.

Beautiful Location!
I love the trails.
The signs and trail markers are very confusing! I almost got lost. There needs to be better signs.
A great place to go hiking. Many amazing sights. There's also a lake near by, so its perfect for fishing and for swimming as well!
A great start to the Buckeye trail!
The trail is falling apart a bit near the waterfall, but its still very pretty! I wish it didn't have to close when the weather gets bad. They should fix up some of the trail.
A great place to go boating and fishing.
It can be very crowded during the summers.
I go here with my family every year! Its always a lovely time.
So many cool cabins to stay at!

The ledges are very high up. Scary but fun!
